src_original: Vin_2.2054 / [33b4] tathā nivasanaṃ nivasīta yathā parimaṇḍalaṃ saṃsthitaṃ syāt* /  Vin_2.2055 / na cātyutkṛṣṭan nātyapakṛṣṭaṃ /  Vin_2.2056 / nāṃśena śuṇḍāvalambitaṃ /  Vin_2.2057 / nodgataṃ /  Vin_2.2058 / na phaṇavat pratyāgataṃ /  Vin_2.2059 / na samvartikayā sthitaṃ /  Vin_2.2060 / tathā cīvaraṃ prāvṛṇvīta yathā syādyaṃ trayaṃ syāt* /
tgt_original: 不應翹足不應交足。 不太狹足不太廣足。

src_original: Vin_2.2061 / susaṃvṛto ntargṛhaṃ gaccheta /  Vin_2.2062 / supratichanno lpaśabdo nutkṣiptacakṣuḥ yugamātradarśīṃ* /  Vin_2.2063 / notguṇṭhika[33b5]yākṛtikayā notkṛṣṭikayā /  Vin_2.2064 / na vitastikayā /  Vin_2.2065 / na paryastikayā /  Vin_2.2066 / notṭaṅkikayā /  Vin_2.2067 / nojjaṅghikayā /  Vin_2.2068 / nollaṅghikayā /  Vin_2.2069 / notkuṭukikayā /

Vin_2.2070 / na stambhākṛtā /  Vin_2.2071 / na kāyapracālakaṃ /  Vin_2.2072 / na bāhupracālakaṃ /  Vin_2.2073 / na śīrśapracālakaṃ /  Vin_2.2074 / nāṃse ḍhaukikayā /  Vin_2.2075 / na hastasaṃkhagnikayā /  Vin_2.2076 / nātrānanujñātāsane niṣīdeta /  Vin_2.2077 / [34a1] nāpratyavekṣya /
tgt_original: 不應開紐不軒不磔。 亦不褰張而被法服。 所服法衣並皆齊整。

src_original: Vin_2.2078 / na sarvakāyaṃ samavadhāya /  << napādau pādām ādhāya //>>  Vin_2.2079 / na sakthini sakthi /  Vin_2.2080 / na gulphe gulphaṃ /  Vin_2.2081 / na saṃkṣipya pādau /
tgt_original: 不高不下不如象鼻。 非如多羅樹間房穗。

src_original: Vin_2.2082 / na vikṣipya /  Vin_2.2083 / na viḍaṅgikayā /  Vin_2.2084 / na kare kapolaṃ dattvā /  Vin_2.2085 / na pratipuṭakam āsanam utsarpayet /  Vin_2.2086 / sarva satkṛtya piṇḍapādaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāta /
tgt_original: 非如龍首非如豆摶。 而被法服不應持鉢預就其食。

src_original: Vin_2.2087 / na samatittikaṃ /  Vin_2.2088 / samasūpikaṃ /  Vin_2.2089 / sāvadānam* /  Vin_2.2091 / noparyasya dhārayet* /
tgt_original: 不應持鉢在飲食上。 不應置鉢在雜穢處若坑㵎處若崖岸處。

src_original: Vin_2.2092 / satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratibhuñjīt* /  Vin_2.2093 / nātikhuddakair ālopaiḥ /  Vin_2.2094 / nātimahadbhiḥ /  Vin_2.2095 / nānāgata ālope mukhadvāraṃ vṛṇvīt* /
Vin_2.2096 / na bhūyaskāmatayaudanena sūpikaṃ sūpikena caudanaṃ pratichādayeta /
tgt_original: 不應以飯覆羹臛上。 不以羹臛覆其飯上。
